title: GRAPH Data limits in African American Legislators

content.prompt: Which of the following statements presents the most important limitation of the data in the graph?

choices.label: The time frame for the data is misleading.
There is no information about the total number of state legislators.
There are insufficient data points to detect a trend.
The trend over time is potentially misleading and would be easier to read in a pie chart.

skill.text: Skill 3.E: Explain possible limitations of the data provided.
